column4: btw, has anybody here tried out chromium aswell? how stable/usable it's on linux now?
IIRC now xmarks (former foxmarks) now support chromium aswell, so i wonder if chromium is stable enough for generic heavy browsing to make switch
for some time absence of that extention for chromium kept me from trying out, as it's 'must have' plugin for me :)0
I've been using it for a month now wiyj only one hitch yesterday which was fixed overnight , so far so good
